titles.title: Let The Temple Be Filled With His Glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the temple be filled with His glory.
And let the courts be filled with His praise.
And let us worship the Lord
In the Holy of Holies.
Zion rejoices again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Que el templo se llene de su gloria
Que el atrio se llene de alabanza
Adorémosle en el lugar santísimo, santísimo
Sión se regocija otra vez.
